entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-01-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issue with logInit Undefined in MAUI Blazor App on API 28 but Works on API 34 #26902
  • [iOS] Scroll view doesn't scroll when its height is explicitly set #26900
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Resize(Text size) "Organize a Friends Get together" list item in task section is getting truncated: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Resize. #26899
    .NET 9 SR4
  • Incorrect name is defined for Plus(+) button in Home screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Name Role Value. #26898
    .NET 9 SR4
  • No name is defined for Analyze survey results, Develop action plan, Read a book in Task section in Home screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Name Role Value. #26897
    .NET 9 SR4
  • No name is defined for All cleared button in Task section in Home screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Name Role Value. #26896
    .NET 9 SR4
  • Role is not defined for "Improve work life balance, Learn to speak another language" as buttons or cards in Projects section in Home screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Name role value. #26895
    .NET 9 SR4

Closed

  • CharacterSpacing issue with Button Text in iOS #26901
  • [Android] Debug stops when open a FilePicker #26639
  • Can't debug with VSCode or Visual Studio for Windows #26627
  • .Net Won't Run Android Emulator #26592
  • Hyper-V in windows features was not there to activate #26778
  • Error building with XCODE 16.1 #26859
  • .NET MAUI does not show in Visual Studio #26870
  • TimePicker Displays AM/PM Text in Different Languages with hh:mm tt Format on .NET 9 SDK (iOS Only) #26885

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Set FillViewport to true to MauiHorizontalScrollView #26904
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Improve accessibility sample content new project template #26903
    area-templates, a11y/sf-template-app, .NET 9 SR4
  • [iOS] Simplify iOS ScrollView - improvement #26893
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview

Merged

  • [Testing] Enable Catalyst UI Tests with Screenshot Verification - 2 #26874
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
